title: Camberwell 'murder': Teen dies of stab wounds as police hunt his killer
text:
Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

A murder investigation has begun after an 18-year-old man died of stab wounds in south London.

Police were called to Grimsel Path on the Brandon Estate in Camberwell soon after 8pm on Thursday night after reports of a stabbing.

They found a man with stab injuries, who was pronounced dead at the scene an hour later, the Metropolitan Police said in a statement.

No arrests have yet been made as investigations continue.

His next of kin have been informed.

Formal identification awaits and a post mortem examination will be held in due course.

Anyone who can assist police is asked to call 101 quoting CAD 7532/10OCT19.

Alternatively tweet @MetCC or call Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111.
description: Police were called to Grimsel Path on the Brandon Estate at 8pm - but the man died an hour later
